title: A Randomised, Open Label, Prospective Study to Assess Two Different Therapeutic Strategies Following First Treatment Failure in HIV-1 Infected Subjects

operands.value: HIV-1 infected males or females
over 18 years of age
signed informed consent
currently receiving a stable antiretroviral regimen comprising of two or more licensed NRTIs
one licensed NNRTI
boosted protease inhibitor
previous protease inhibitor resistance documented on HIV-1 genotypic resistance testing
toxicity, intolerance or virological failure if receiving an NNRTI containing regimen at screening
toxicity or intolerance if receiving a boosted-protease inhibitor regimen at screening
plasma HIV RNA < 400 copies/mL at screening
willing to modify antiretroviral therapy, in accordance with the randomisation assignment
previous exposure to etravirine
subjects in good health upon medical history, physical exam, and laboratory testing in the opinion of the investigator
serologic evidence of active HBV infection evidenced by negative hepatitis B surface antigen
female subjects who are heterosexually active and of childbearing potential must practice contraception from screening through completion of the study
barrier contraceptives (condom, diaphragm with spermicide)
IUD or Depo PLUS a barrier contraceptive
female subjects of childbearing potential must have a negative pregnancy test
must have minimum age of 18 Years
current alcohol abuse or drug dependence
pregnancy
active opportunistic infection or significant co-morbidities
current prohibited concomitant medication
a likelihood of diminished response to any of the study treatment arms, in the opinion of the investigator, based on HIV genotypic resistance testing

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('HIV-1 infected males or females'), Symbol('currently receiving a stable antiretroviral regimen comprising of two or more licensed NRTIs'), Symbol('female subjects of childbearing potential must have a negative pregnancy test'), Symbol('female subjects who are heterosexually active and of childbearing potential must practice contraception from screening through completion of the study'), Symbol('must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('over 18 years of age'), Symbol('signed informed consent'), Symbol('subjects in good health upon medical history, physical exam, and laboratory testing in the opinion of the investigator'), Symbol('willing to modify antiretroviral therapy, in accordance with the randomisation assignment'), Not(Symbol('previous exposure to etravirine')), Not(Symbol('previous protease inhibitor resistance documented on HIV-1 genotypic resistance testing')), Not(Symbol('serologic evidence of active HBV infection evidenced by negative hepatitis B surface antigen')), Or(Symbol('IUD or Depo PLUS a barrier contraceptive'), Symbol('barrier contraceptives (condom, diaphragm with spermicide)')), Or(Symbol('boosted protease inhibitor'), Symbol('one licensed NNRTI')), Or(Symbol('toxicity, intolerance or virological failure if receiving an NNRTI containing regimen at screening'), And(Symbol('plasma HIV RNA < 400 copies/mL at screening'), Symbol('toxicity or intolerance if receiving a boosted-protease inhibitor regimen at screening'))), Not(Or(Symbol('a likelihood of diminished response to any of the study treatment arms, in the opinion of the investigator, based on HIV genotypic resistance testing'), Symbol('active opportunistic infection or significant co-morbidities'), Symbol('current alcohol abuse or drug dependence'), Symbol('current prohibited concomitant medication'), Symbol('pregnancy'))))
